divs: Sighting DetailsWe were traveling on the NY state Thruway I just happened to look out of my window and saw something I knew was not an airplane...I continued to watch it and as it got closer, I could see it was huge...it was circular and had lights all the way around it. Airplanes don't have that many lights and they are not as bright as these were then it just disappeared... this was the first one. About a mile down the road we witnessed the same exact thing then the third one was the exact same shape size everything.....I believe in aliens so I know that what I saw was an alien spaceship... too close to mistake it for anything else. All three of them just disappeared. All of the sudden, they were gone. I know they're coming and they're coming soon. I thought it was awesome and amazing.
